title: Vegan Bolognese sauce
ingredients: ['1 large onion, cubed', '350g soya or vegan mince', '225g sliced mushrooms', '240ml tomato passata', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (500g) packet ready made polenta, sliced into 12 pieces']
